snippet.title: Granblue Fantasy: Versus - Gamescom 2019 Trailer [PLAYSTATION 4]
snippet.description:
Power, skill, and spirit collide as Granblue Fantasy: Versus will be released onto the PlayStation 4 within Europe and Australia.

Granblue Fantasy: Versus will be playable at Gamescom 2019 on the PlayStation Booth in Hall 7 and will feature characters from the Closed Beta Test as well as the newly announced character Percival.

Game Page: https://marvelousgames.com/blogs/games/granblue-fantasy-versus
Official Website: https://versus.granbluefantasy.jp/?lang=en

About Granblue Fantasy Versus:
In Granblue Fantasy: Versus, power, skill, and spirit collide in a quest to find the true champion of the ring. Players can take on AI opponents or fight against human opponents in local or online two-player matches.

Our Social Channels:
Subscribe to our YouTube Channel: http://youtube.com/marvelousgames
Follow Us On Twitter: http://twitter.com/marvelous_games
Like Us On Facebook: http://facebook.com/marvelousgames
Tag Us on Instagram: http://instagram.com/marvelous_europe
